name: Arctic Permafrost Geospatial Centre (APGC)
description: Metadata catalog based on CKAN, a web-based data catalog software, providing information on individual datasets, including title, abstract, product guides, and detailed metadata on thematic, spatial, and temporal properties via an Additional Info table. Product guides describe data processing methods. Datasets are documented according to FAIR data principles.
owner_name: Alfred Wegener Institute, Helmholtz Centre for Polar and Marine Research (AWI)
